messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What should be done to prevent the Horror's manifestation?
Put the papers well away from anywhere they can do direct harm.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the source of the danger in the Witch Trial Papers?
The illustrated portion of the papers.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the process of cleaning up the Call of Cthulhu tar-like residue?
It will take 1D6 rounds
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is able to contain and deal with the Horror in this scenario?
Abner Wick
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the goal of using this skill?
The goal is up to the player, perhaps dispelling the monster from the papers.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigators fail to find the Witch Trial Papers before the Horror's final manifestation?
They may fail at either or both of these goals, leading to dire consequences.
You are a helpful assistant.
What will happen if the investigators succeed in returning the Witch Trial Papers to Dean Fallon?
The investigators will gain Dean Fallon as a professional contact of good standing and be financially rewarded to an agreed sum or $250 dollars each.
You are a helpful assistant.
What might happen to the investigators the next day, even if they return the Witch Trial Papers to Dean Fallon?
The investigators may realize things are not at an end when they read in the newspaper that Dean Fallon has been horribly murdered in a brutal and bizarre manner by the Horror.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the reward for returning the Witch Trial Papers or forgeries to Dean Fallon?
$250 dollars each or an agreed sum
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the investigators if the Keeper lets the Horror manifest?
The Horror will hunt down the investigators
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigators fail to prevent the Horror's manifestation?
They each make a Sanity roll as they come to terms with their failure to prevent the loss of life.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the Sanity point outcomes if the Horror manifests in Arkham?
They each should make a Sanity roll with a 1D3/1D10 SAN loss.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who has been murdered in the newspaper?
Dean Fallon
You are a helpful assistant.
What should happen to investigators if they succeed in battling the Horror?
They should gain +1D6 Sanity points.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who are the keepers that can continue the story?
Keepers wishing to continue the story
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the title of the chapter?
chapter 15: scenarios
